Dragons: Defenders of Berk - Season 2 - Episode 3 (WEB-DL - 720p - MP4)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Adventure takes flight with all-new episodes of Dragons: Defenders of Berk Part 1!
Join Hiccup and Toothless as they team up with their brave human friends and loyal
dragon allies to challenge never-before-seen creatures with incredible powers.
The fate of the village is at stake with every thrilling mission in this awesome
animated series based on the smash-hit movie How to Train Your Dragon!

Produced by DreamWorks Animation.

obsessed with hunting the Night Fury.
